Center for African Studies (CAS): Interdisciplinary research and teaching on the diverse cultures, societies, and languages of Africa.
Center for East Asian & Pacific Studies: Promoting the study of East Asia and the Pacific, including its languages, cultures, and societies.
Center for Global Studies (CGS): Fostering research and education on global issues, themes, and processes that transcend national borders.
Center for Latin American & Caribbean St: Supporting research and training on the histories, cultures, and contemporary issues of Latin America and the Caribbean.

Russian, East European, and Eurasian Cen: Supporting the interdisciplinary study of Russia, Eastern Europe, and the Eurasian region.
